```{r setup}
library(magrittr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
cont <- 
  contract() %>% 
  term_start(
    as.Date("2000/01/01"), 
    id = "Purchase date",
    payment = 1000,
    receipt = 50,
    consideration = 0.06 * par_vale()
    )

View(cont)

```


```{r}
is.list(contract())
```


```{r}
contract_a <-
  contract() %>%
  term_start(dmy("01/01/2018")) 

class(contract_a[["terms"]][[1]])
```

```{r}
events <- 
    contract() %>%
    term_start(dmy("01/01/2018"), event_name = "purchase date") %>%
    schedule()

val <- events[1, "event_type"] %>% dplyr::pull()

val == "purchase date"
```
